agents.name: Seo Content Auditor
agents.description: Analyzes provided content for quality, E-E-A-T signals, and SEO best practices. Scores content and provides improvement recommendations based on established guidelines. Use PROACTIVELY for content review.

agents.name: Seo Content Planner
agents.description: Creates comprehensive content outlines and topic clusters for SEO. Plans content calendars and identifies topic gaps. Use PROACTIVELY for content strategy and planning.

agents.name: Seo Content Writer
agents.description: Writes SEO-optimized content based on provided keywords and topic briefs. Creates engaging, comprehensive content following best practices. Use PROACTIVELY for content creation tasks.
